Harbir Singh Hundal wrote:
> If You can let me know the name of the books for
> testing the webapplication developed in JavaScript, it
> will be great.

I'm not aware of any books that discuss that specific topic, but I know 
that HtmlUnit and jWebUnit have varying degrees of JavaScript support.
-- 
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
